WorkItem.Description:
Currently when you create an update or import a catalog it does a full publish similar to what SCUP would do, and doesn't have any option to make this a Metadata Only publish.

Metadata only has a number of advantages, primarily being for items you only want to report on but don't want to remediate.

Comments.Message: This item is similar to https://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/workitem/149, they should be merged.

They are similar, which 149 being specific to only importing a catalog while this one is for publishing to WSUS a single update, a group of updates, or importing a catalog.  So as long as they are merged with the intent of providing full Metadata Only publishing across the board that would be be great.

Reason Closed: Postponed 

You will have to wait WPP V2.
